actors.name: Lindsay Jones
actors.short_summary:
Lindsay Jones(Lindsay Tuggey)是Rooster Teeth的员工同时也是RWBY中女主角Ruby的女声优。她在RT Recap、RT Podcast以及Internet Box Podcast中露脸而为人所知。
2014年5月9日与Michael Jones(RWBY中Sun Wukong的声优)结婚

actors.name: Kara Eberle
actors.short_summary: Kara Eberle是RWBY中女主角Weiss的女声优及Rooster Teeth的办公室经理和招待员。

actors.name: Arryn Zech
actors.short_summary:
Arryn Zech是RWBY中女主角Blake的女声优。她是一名博主、摄影师和作家，正在德克萨斯州立大学就读新闻系。
亦为Rooster Teeth的Halo同人引擎动画Red vs. Blue系列中的Dr. Emily Grey配过音

actors.name: Barbara Dunkelman
actors.short_summary: Barbara Dunkelman是RWBY中女主角Yang的女声优和RT的市场与社区经理，以及RTX(Rooster Teeth Expo)的助理主管。她经常在RT Podcast露脸，还以经常说恐怖的双关语而闻名。

actors.name: Neath Oum
actors.short_summary: Monty Oum的弟弟。配音演员。

actors.name: Caiti Ward
actors.short_summary:
Caiti Ward voices Velvet Scarlatina in RWBY. She is 23 years old and originally comes from Sydney, Australia, but currently resides in Austin, Texas with her husband Jack Pattillo, who voices Junior Xiong.

  Caiti is a model, an actress, and a voice actress in Austin, Los Angeles, and various parts of Australia.

  She is the founder of Roo Teeth, the official Australian Rooster Teeth fan community. Since its establishment, she has run one major fan event every year, as well as multiple minor fan events around Australia. Roo Teeth is currently the biggest online Rooster Teeth fan group outside of the official website itself.

  Caiti states that she has been a fan of Rooster Teeth since Red vs. Blue first began, (seeing the first episode on a burnt copy her brother gave her) and has adored them ever since, devoting time, energy, and creativity to ensure members of the community enjoy their time online at RoosterTeeth.com.

  Outside of Rooster Teeth - Caiti is a Butterfly Ambassador for an Australian organization, the Life Changing Experiences Foundation, which assists "at risk" young girls and provides them with education, resources, and strong relationships with positive role models in order to help them towards a better quality of life. She is also the co-founder of In Real Life, an organization intended to get people from online communities to participate in charitable work offline.


Personal Website:http://www.caitiward.com/
Rooster Teeth Profile:http://roosterteeth.com/caiti

actors.name: Shannon McCormick
actors.short_summary: Shannon Lee McCormick voices Ozpin in RWBY. McCormick is a classically trained actor who is perhaps best known for playing the role of Agent Washington in Rooster Teeth web series Red vs. Blue. He has also appeared as himself in several RT Shorts.

actors.name: Kathleen Zuelch
actors.short_summary: Kathleen Zuelch是RWBY的制片人之一,为RWBY的Glynda Goodwitch以及Halo同人引擎喜剧动画Red Vs. Blue中的Agent Texas配音

actors.name: Samantha Ireland
actors.short_summary:
Samantha Ireland is the voice actress for Nora Valkyrie. She first began providing her voice for Freelancer Agent Connecticut, or C.T., for the popular machinima series Red vs. Blue.

She worked as a producer in the web series "Once You Leave" and played Molly on it. She has also appeared in several RT Shorts.

actors.name: Jen Brown
actors.short_summary: Jen Brown is the voice actress for Lisa Lavender and Pyrrha Nikos. She also voices Carolina in Rooster Teeth's Red vs. Blue.

actors.name: Miles Luna
actors.short_summary: Miles Luna是RWBY的编剧之一，以在RT任职编辑和图片设计闻名，而且他还是Red Vs. Blue第十季的主编剧及导演。他是继Monty与Kerry之后的第三名编剧，也在RT Podcast露过数次面。Miles负责管理Twitter或自己日志上的RTCQ(Rooster Teeth Community Questions:RT社区问题)

actors.name: Gray G. Haddock
actors.short_summary:
Gray Haddock is the animation producer at Rooster Teeth Productions, and the voice actor for Roman Torchwick and the White Fang Lieutenant in RWBY. He is also known for voicing Locus and General Doyle in Red vs. Blue , as well as Rusty Bonjour in X-Ray and Vav.

  With Rooster Teeth, he has worked on reality game show The Gauntlet, as well as being lead compositor on Red vs. Blue Seasons 9 and 10. His other work includes director of photography on various live action projects, post production supervisor and editor.

  Prior to his work with Rooster Teeth, Gray worked on various films, anime, television series and video games, both in voice acting roles and visual effects.

actors.name: Taylor McNee
actors.short_summary:
Taylor McNee (née Pelto) was the Art Director for Volume 1, a 3D Artist for RWBY, and is the voice actress for Penny Polendina. She is married to former Rooster Teeth employee Bret McNee. （2016年2月29日喜得贵子）

Her previous work includes 3D assets and animation for Red vs. Blue Season 10, as well as the video games Darksiders II and Warhammer 40,000: Dark Millennium.

actors.name: Michael Jones
actors.short_summary:
Michael Jones是Rooster Teeth Production的员工,同时也是RWBY中Sun Wukong及Red Vs. Blue中Ghanoush的声优
同时是Achievement Hunter的Rage Quit系列的主持人,2014年5月9日与Lindsay Jones(RWBY中Ruby的声优)结婚

actors.name: Jessica Nigri
actors.short_summary:
Jessica Nigri is an American cosplayer and promotional model. She voices Cinder Fall in RWBY. She also provided the voice of Pink Private in Red vs. Blue and will be the English voice actress of the titular character in Super Sonico: The Animation.

Initially finding fame in 2009 after her "Sexy Pikachu" cosplay became a viral success on the Internet, Nigri is active at numerous fan conventions for video games, anime and comic book series.

She has worked as a model since 2012, appearing in promotional material for several video games, such as Lollipop Chainsaw, Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag and Gears of War 3.

actors.name: Jason Rose
actors.short_summary: Jason Rose is a producer and filmmaker based in Los Angeles, California. Formerly a model abroad in Asia, Jason now spends his time working towards directing films. He was a long time friend of the show's creator, Monty Oum, and had often expressed his desire to work with the filmmaker.

actors.name: Ashley Jenkins
actors.short_summary:
前女子职业游戏团队Frag Dolls成员（2004年8月 - 2008年8月）。

Rooster Teeth工作室的YouTube多媒体新闻频道The Know的主持人。

配音演员。

actors.name: Kerry Shawcross
actors.short_summary: Kerry Shawcross，亦称为“Dragonface"，是RT的员工，以及RWBY的手稿剧本作者之一

actors.name: Elizabeth Maxwell
actors.short_summary: 美国配音演员。2004年起活跃至今。

actors.name: 井上喜久子
actors.short_summary:
在1989年配《乱马1/2》中的天道霞（天道かすみ）而大受欢迎，且从为天道茜（天道あかね）配音的声优日高法子至工作人员都叫她“大姊”。而本身是妹妹的井上喜久子（姊姊是其经纪人），一直都很憧憬“大姊”的角色，fans们也延续这个昵称。
之后1993年担任《幸运女神》OVA女主角蓓儿丹娣的配音，确立了她的温柔气质配音走向。
1996年担任《机械女神》恶役潘塔的演出，其冷酷凶狠的表现彻底颠覆了以往温柔婉约的形象。类似的角色还有樱花大战３的罗贝莉亚。
“17岁教”教祖，自称“井上喜久子17岁”。绰号是大姐（お姉ちゃん）。该声优著名介绍词为“井上喜久子，17岁（井上喜久子、17才）”，原自电台节目《かきくけ喜久子のさしすせSonata》里山本麻里安的介绍词“山本麻里安，16岁（山本麻里安、16才です）”，讲成“井上喜久子，16岁（井上喜久子、16才です）”。之后，山本麻里安17岁，而衍生“井上喜久子，17岁（井上喜久子、17才）”，也有一段时期变成18岁；不过，近期都以17岁自称。
2008年2月16日，以来宾身分参加开拓动漫祭时被问到：“为什么不用15岁或20岁，而要用不上不下的17岁？”当时井上答：“因为15岁太年轻，还只是少女，而20岁就又算是大人了，所以介于其中的17岁最好。”
当在现场活动作自我介绍时，观众则会在“井上喜久子，17岁（井上喜久子、17才）”之后喊著“喂!喂!（おいおい）”，外加手势手背敲击对方来呼应介绍词，而本人在节目或影片声优单独自我介绍时，自己也会喊著“喂!喂!（おいおい）”跟做手势动作。

actors.name: Jen Taylor
actors.short_summary: Jennifer Lee "Jen" Taylor is the voice of Salem in RWBY, originally credited as the Mysterious Narrator. Her voice work is also prominently featured in the narration of Volume 2's RWBY: World of Remnant complementary series.

detail.summary:
Roman Torchwick was a character in RWBY. Born in the city of Wind Path and abandoned by his mother as a child, Roman became a pickpocket from Mistral in his younger days. After he was caught by members of Spider and was taken under the wing of Lil' Miss Malachite, he became her second-in-command until he started becoming more ambitious than her and defected from the gang to become independent while eventually meeting Neopolitan in the process.

Later becoming a wanted criminal in Vale, he made a very small cameo in the "Yellow" Trailer before being properly introduced in "Ruby Rose". There, he orchestrated the robbery of Dust supplies from the store From Dust Till Dawn, but was ultimately foiled by Ruby Rose and briefly imprisoned by Atlas forces after a Vale Grimm invasion.

His weapon of choice was his cane, known as Melodic Cudgel. He served as the main antagonist of Volume 1 and the secondary antagonist of Volumes 2 and 3.

In "Heroes and Monsters", he was swallowed by a Griffon after fighting Ruby atop a hijacked Atlesian Airship.

He features as a main character in the novel, RWBY: Roman Holiday.
detail.name: Roman Torchwick

value.v: ローマン・トーチウィック

detail.summary:
A very talented fighter who graduated at the top of her class in primary combat school. She set a record for winning a Regional Tournament four consecutive years.
Pyrrha has been treated like a superstar her whole life, but she is very humble and just wants to be treated like her friends.
She starts having feelings for Jaune while mentoring him.
She uses Miló and Akoúo, a javelin that can transform into a short sword or a long-range rifle and a shield.
detail.name: Pyrrha Nikos

value.v: ブレイク・ベラドンナ

detail.summary: Sun Wukong is a student from the Kingdom of Vacuo, who later moved to Mistral and attended Haven Academy before transferring to Shade. He is a Faunus and the leader of Team SSSN, making his first appearance in the episode "The Stray" of RWBY Volume 1. Sun's weapon is a collapsible staff that separates into two pairs of nunchucks made of guns called Ruyi Bang and Jingu Bang.
detail.name: Sun Wukong

detail.summary:
Glynda Goodwitch is a staff member and current Headmistress at Beacon Academy.
She was introduced in "Ruby Rose", in which she saved Ruby Rose from an attack by Cinder Fall. Her weapon of choice is her crop, The Disciplinarian.
detail.name: Glynda Goodwitch

value.v: グリンダ・グッドウィッチ

detail.summary:
Yang, the fourth member of Team RWBY, is a yellow-haired girl and, at 17 years of age, Ruby's older half-sister. She wields twin shotgun gauntlets called Ember Celica. Her Semblance works on a "recoil-based system": whenever Yang takes a hit, her strength, toughness and striking power rise in proportion to her injuries. Her glowing hair and eye color change are caused by excess energy from the buildup, which also results in Yang often acting very "hotheaded" in battle.

Yang is the "big sister" of the group, caring deeply for her teammates. She is also very optimistic, never giving up in battle and hard times. Yang has revealed that her birth mother left her family shortly after she was born and hasn't been seen since, which acts as a driving force for her character. She has been determined to find Raven ever since she realized that Summer Rose, Ruby's mother who also helped raise Yang, wasn't her own biological mother. Yang wanted to become a Huntress because of the adventure, she calls herself a thrill-seeker in search of a life where she doesn't know what lies ahead of her.

Near the end of Volume 3, during the Battle of Beacon, Yang's right arm is severed by White Fang member Adam Taurus, following a desperate attempt to help a wounded Blake. In the aftermath of the fall of Beacon, she is bedridden in her home on the island of Patch, where she has become bitter and depressed. After the time-skip between Volume 3 and 4, Yang is still on Patch, trying to get used to life with one arm. She shows signs of PTSD after the events of Volume 3, having visions and nightmares of Adam cutting her arm. She is also shown to be hesitant to use a bionic arm sent to her by General Ironwood. After an encouraging talk with her father Taiyang, Prof. Port, and Dr. Oobleck, in which Yang admits to being scared of moving on, she puts the arm on and resumes training with her father. While sparring, Yang learns to fight without relying on her Semblance as much as she did before, and learns more about her mother from Taiyang. In the volume finale, she arrives at Anima and heads for Mistral to find Ruby.

Yang is an allusion to Goldilocks; her name in Chinese is 陽小龍 and translates to "sun little dragon". Prior to the series, one of Oum's Tweets had a photograph of his computer monitor that reveals a file named "Taiyang Xiao Long", later revealed to be the name of Yang's father.
detail.name: Yang Xiao Long

detail.summary:
The title character of the show is a 15-year-old girl who typically dresses in a black dress and a red cloak. She wields Crescent Rose, a scythe that can transform into a high caliber sniper rifle. Her Semblance is called "Speed", enabling her to run faster than the human eye can catch, and change directions in mid-air.

As her mother Summer Rose died when she was very young, Ruby is raised on the island of Patch by her father Taiyang and older half-sister Yang Xiao Long. Her uncle Qrow Branwen teaches her how to wield a scythe and fight properly, with Ruby stating that she was "complete garbage" before he took her in as his pupil. At the start of the series, when she fights off a group of robbers at a Dust shop, she impresses Professor Ozpin, the headmaster of Beacon Academy, and is allowed to transfer from Signal Academy to Beacon two years early, entering in the same class as Yang, with the goal of becoming a Huntress. Inspired by the heroic fairy tales Yang read to her as a child, Ruby strives to become a Huntress to protect the world from evil. Although she is socially awkward at first, obsessed with weapons and dependent on her sister, she becomes friends with her classmates, and exhibits skills and qualities that eventually place her as the leader of Team RWBY.

After the Fall of Beacon, Ruby learns from her uncle that she and her mother come from a line of powerful silver-eyed warriors who have been feared by Grimm since ancient times. A few months later, Ruby travels with the remaining members of Team JNPR to Haven Academy in Mistral in order to find leads on their enemies. Together, they informally call themselves Team RNJR (pronounced "ranger"). During their travels, Ruby is targeted by Tyrian, but she evades capture with help from her uncle.

Ruby alludes to the fairy tale character Little Red Riding Hood.
detail.name: Ruby Rose

detail.summary:
The leader of Team JNPR.
Despite coming from a long line of Huntsmen, he lacks combat skills. Unlike the other students, he didn’t graduate from a primary combat school. However, he has great potential as a leader and a burgeoning skillset in strategic and situational judgment. Pyrrha recognizes his abilities and helps him grow under her guidance.
His weapon is a family heirloom called Crocea Mors. It is a one-handed sword and a scabbard that transforms into a shield.
detail.name: Jaune Arc

detail.summary: The headmaster of Beacon Academy, he scouted Ruby and permitted her to enroll at Beacon based on her talents. He is typically both stoic and affable towards students and has fosters trust from those he speaks to. However, while he seems to have the best intentions there are hints he's hiding things.
detail.name: Ozpin

detail.summary:
角色原型是索爾，外像力是吸收電力，能藉由吸收電能強化力量。活潑好動，和Ren是青梅竹馬，兩人都是孤兒。名字在日文中意思是「無家」，姓氏源自為北歐神話中的女武神。
    武器為「神威戰錘（Magnhild）」，是一把能夠轉換成長柄戰鎚的滾筒連發榴彈砲，在第四季中還新增了可以用外像力充電使出蓄力攻擊的機能。
detail.name: Nora Valkyrie

value.v: ノーラ・ヴァルキリー

detail.summary:
中國風的黑髮少年，武器（兩把附有刀刃的綠色衝鋒槍）令人下意識的想起螳螂。
兩手袖口似乎具備四次元收納功能，將兩把刃槍收納在袖口內。
跟Nora是青梅竹馬。

Voice Actor：
Monty Oum (Volumes 1～2) 
Neath Oum (Volume 3～现在) 
斉藤壮馬 (日语版)
detail.name: Lie Ren

detail.summary: CFVY (Coffee) 队成员，萌萌的兔耳，喜欢照相。
detail.name: Velvet Scarlatina

value.v: ヴェルヴェット・スカーラティー

detail.summary: Penny is a character in RWBY who was introduced in the episode The Stray, when she was found lying on the ground after Weiss crashed into her, chasing after Sun Wukon.
detail.name: Penny Polendina

value.v: ペニー・ポレンディーナ
ジェイムズ・アイアンウッド

detail.summary:
信号学院（Signal）的讲师，同时是Ruby的师父。武器为一把可变形的钐刀。

"New Challengers..."(Volume 3, Chapter 2) 正式出场。

昔日队友：Summer Rose, Raven Branwen, Taiyang Xiao Long.
detail.name: Qrow Branwen

value.v: クロウ・ブランウェン

detail.summary:
Taiyang Xiao Long, also known as Tai, is the father of Yang Xiao Long and Ruby Rose. He is mentioned to be a teacher at Signal Academy on the island of Patch where the girls grew up.

He was part of Team STRQ alongside Summer Rose, Raven Branwen and Qrow Branwen. He also had a relationship with Raven, resulting in Yang's birth. After her disappearance, he started a relationship with Summer that resulted in the birth of his second child, Ruby.
detail.name: Taiyang Xiao Long

value.v: タイヤン・シャオロン

detail.summary:
角色原型是白雪公主，名字取自「白雪」的德語。代表色是白色。慣用手是左手(平時戰鬥時或寫字時都是使用左手)
    故事開始時是「雪倪尘晶公司」的未來繼承人。有一名姊姊Winter和一名弟弟Whitley。初登場時雖然十分認真但卻相當任性且自我，第一季時更對自己沒有成為隊長一事而對Peter Port教授大吐苦水，但在其開導下開始學習如何成為一名最好的隊員，並逐漸融入團隊中。第三季Beacon學院被摧毀時被其父親帶回Atlas，第四季時在慈善晚會上因賓客對Beacon的詆毀而與之發生爭執，一怒之下失控召喚出一頭山豬型召喚物，所幸被與會的James Ironwood將軍擋下，其後被父親剝奪繼承權並限制自由，最終在管家Klein幫助下逃家成功，前往Mistral，欲與姊姊Winter會合。第五季時因為搭乘的運輸機被女王索矛蜂襲擊而墜毀，並被Raven俘虜，並從其手下Vernal口中得知Winter被召回Atlas，之後和前來找Raven的Yang重逢，並經由Raven的能力而得以和抵達Mistral的Ruby會合。
    外像力為「雕紋」；是目前已知少數可以遺傳的外像力，能施展各種法陣進行攻防，目前總共出現過吸力（黑）、斥力（白）及時間加速三種。
    據其姐姐Winter所述，「雕紋」最終能召喚出類似守護者的存在（被召喚出來的會是自己過去生命中面對的強敵），其型態不一，Winter能召喚各種Grimm，而Weiss於第三季第11集時召喚出一支持有大劍的手臂，擋下了機甲對Velvet的攻擊，並將機甲一刀兩斷。第四季第九集，終於成功召喚出手持大劍的巨大騎士（該騎士為預告片中和Weiss戰鬥的對象）。
    武器為「柳葉白菀（Myrtenaster）」，一把銀白色的護手細劍，護手部位裝有儲藏塵晶的中折式左輪結構，能夠根據不同用途切換使用。
detail.name: Weiss Schnee

detail.summary:
信标学院（Beacon）的二年级学生，CFVY队的队长。武器是可变形为手提包的重机枪。

实战旅行中首次登场。(Field Trip, Volume 2, Chapter 8)
detail.name: Coco Adel

value.v: ネプチューン・ヴァシリアス

detail.summary:
主角之一Weiss Schnee的姐姐，将军James Ironwood的手下。

外表冷酷，被Qrow称为"Ice Queen"，但与妹妹感情很好，对她十分关心。

"It's Brawl in the Family"(Volume 3, Chapter 3) 首次登场。
detail.name: Winter Schnee

value.v: ウィンター・シュニー

detail.summary: RWBY中的人物，反派Roman Torchwick的助手，用伞作武器，似乎有虹膜异色症
detail.name: Neo Politan

detail.summary:
Grimm的主人，反派大Boss. 

Salem是Remnant世界里Grimm的统治者，拥有强大的魔力。她曾经是远古的人类，和远古时期的Ozma是恋人。光明之神和黑暗之神赐给Salem‘永生’，赐给Ozpin ‘转世’的力量。Salem掉进了Grimm pool获得了无上的力量。

她的目的是找到所有的Maidens，并且夺取她们的力量，获得所有的Relics，永久剥夺人类在面对Grimm是能够拥有的力量。而Ozpin希望人类能够团结在一起，永久的斗争就此展开….
detail.name: Salem
